Plot heritability (h2) enrichment

Source: R/POLYFUN.R
POLYFUN.h2_enrichment_SNPgroups_plot.Rd

Plot heritability (h2) enrichment

POLYFUN.h2_enrichment_SNPgroups_plot(
  RES,
  snp_groups = c("GWAS lead", "UCS", "Consensus (-PolyFun)", "Consensus"),
  comparisons_filter = function(x) {     if ("Consensus" %in% x)          return(x) },
  method = "wilcox.test",
  remove_outliers = T,
  title = "S-LDSC heritability enrichment",
  xlabel = "SNP group",
  ylabel = bquote(~"h"^2 ~ "enrichment"),
  show_xtext = T,
  show_padj = T,
  show_signif = T,
  vjust_signif = 0.5,
  show_plot = T,
  save_path = F
)

See also

Other polyfun: POLYFUN.compute_priors(), POLYFUN.download_ref_files(), POLYFUN.find_polyfun_folder(), POLYFUN.finemapper(), POLYFUN.functional_enrichment(), POLYFUN.gather_annotations(), POLYFUN.gather_ldscores(), POLYFUN.get_precomputed_priors(), POLYFUN.h2_enrichment_SNPgroups(), POLYFUN.h2_enrichment(), POLYFUN.help(), POLYFUN.initialize(), POLYFUN.ldsc_annot_enrichment(), POLYFUN.munge_summ_stats(), POLYFUN.plot(), POLYFUN.prepare_snp_input(), POLYFUN.read_parquet(), POLYFUN.run_ldsc(), POLYFUN_SUSIE()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
root <- "/sc/arion/projects/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping"
merged_dat <- merge_finemapping_results(dataset = file.path("Data/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019"), LD_reference = "UKB", minimum_support = 0)
RES <- POLYFUN.h2_enrichment_SNPgroups(merged_dat=merged_dat, out.path="/sc/arion/projects/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Nalls23andMe_2019/_genome_wide/PolyFun/output")

plot.h2 <- POLYFUN.h2_enrichment_SNPgroups_plot(RES = RES, show_plot = T)
}
